ygData.subject: [eqbards] Incandescent Bracer
ygData.msgSnippet: I looted this item a few days ago from Glucose, a named frosticube in Icewell Keep (the pit under Thurgadin). AC8 Cha +15 Cold +5 NO DROP Bard only. Despite
ygData.messageBody:
I looted this item a few days ago from Glucose, a named frosticube in
Icewell Keep (the pit under Thurgadin). AC8 Cha +15 Cold +5 NO DROP Bard
only. Despite the name, it only fits in your waist slot. Not sure if they
meant it to be this way, but personally I think it would make a pretty weak
wrist item for the level of the mob it drops off of. We killed him once, he
dropped the bracer. We killed him again the next day, and he dropped
nothing. *shrug*
